content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I read the contents of "new_file.txt" and appended more text to it. I attempted to get hyperlinks from a Wikipedia page using the "google" command, but it returned too much output. I was instructed not to execute it again with the same arguments. Later, I executed the "ls -la" command and received a list of files, including "new_file.txt". I then received a message that the "write_to_file" command was successful in writing text to "new_file.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is some text that I am writing to the new file.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "text": "This is some more text that I am adding to the file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "get_hyperlinks", "args": {"url": "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "What is the capital of France?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paris", "https://home.adelphi.edu/~ca19535/page%204.html", "https://www.britannica.com/place/France", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_capitals_of_France", "https://www.britannica.com/place/Paris", "https://www.nytimes.com/2013/10/04/t-magazine/marseille-the-secret-capital-of-france.html", "https://www.coe.int/en/web/interculturalcities/paris", "https://www.npr.org/2021/09/25/1039336681/grasse-perfume-france"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ls -la"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'total 32\\ndrwxrwxr-x 3 1000 rvm  4096 Jun 13 21:41 .\\ndrwxrwxr-x 1 root root   32 Jun 13 21:40 ..\\ndrwxr-xr-x 6 root root   81 Jun 13 19:37 Atlas\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    2 Jun 13 21:40 atlas.json\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm  1859 Jun 13 19:44 atlas.settings.yaml\\n-rw-rw-r-- 1 1000 rvm   108 Jun 13 21:40 atlas.yaml\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  301 Jun 13 21:41 file_logger.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  104 Jun 13 21:41 new_file.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  140 Jun 13 21:29 options.txt\\n-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   13 Jun 13 19:45 river.txt\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb''", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "text": "This is some text that I am writing to the new file."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: This is some text that I am writing to the new file.', type='action_result')]
"""
